body.p: James Pirtle, Esqr, a young lawyer, & the son of the Hon Henry Pirtle, would like to have a commission as Notary -- Public; if you will give him one. Will you do so? He is in his fathers office, & is very clever.

I am, very res,
Yr obt Servt
Hamilton Pope

His Excellency
Beriah Magoffin
Frankfort
Ky

Jefferson Co Notaries
S. S. Bush
James Pirtle
appd. Jany 23rd 1862
